website_summaries.verdict: With its extra-strong blades, this affordable three-blade razor keeps on going.
pros: Handles curves well with a pivoting head
Blades are designed to last for more than a dozen shaves
cons: Some reported that their skin didn't feel especially smooth after shaving

customer_reviews.title: Toxic
customer_reviews.text: Gillette doesnt like their customers.... after 17 years of buying their products im moving to SCHICK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product, misleading image/ information
customer_reviews.text: The product works great, however, the image displayed and the name of the product is misleading. The image shows two blades while the name notes that there is "1 blade refill" This led me to assume that the product would contain one blade plus another blade as refill. The actual product only includes one handle and one blade. not like the image on the product
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Mach 3
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you are used to using the Mach 3. These blades feel like they are cheap disposable razors so yeah it was disappointing. I will just have to buy at a local retail store instead.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: As described, but not same as photo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item based on the photo, which indicates one handle and 2 cartridges. On arrival, I received one handle and one cartridge. In hindsight, this is what the item title indicates, but the picture is very misleading. Not worth returning over one cartridge, but caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: OnThePorch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, I keep coming back to mack 3 turbo.
customer_reviews.text: I tried other shaves, disposable, 5 blades, electronic, safety razors, ect.... i just keep coming back to the mach 3 turbo. I get a nice close shave with no cuts and the blades last. This Amazon purchase seems to have the official cartridges and not nock offs. Try the turbos with the King Of Shaves no foam shave cream and daily moisturizer. Its a great combo.
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 cartidge: NO refills. Title/description not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened the Gillette Mach 3 Turbo yet, but the package had one handle and only one cartidge, despite the description and title saying there would be 2 blade refills. I mainly bought this thinking it would be a good deal to try out the Mach 3 Turbo (since I have only used the regular Mach 3 for years). I'm still curious about the Mach 3 Turbo, so I will give this a try. But I won't buy this again on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great razor....
customer_reviews.text: I am a black man that shaves his head and face every other day. This is the BEST razor I have ever purchased. It gives me a great shave, with no bumps, no problems whatsoever. I am satisfied with the product, I am satisfied with the purchase, and I am satisfied with the product. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Gillette is just better
customer_reviews.text: I have used the other razors as heard about on Hannity and Rush radio. All though being a nice product this Gillette Mach 3 is hands down better. The head is narrow to get close to the nose the 1st time instead trying to make the bigger ones work after 3 or 4 pulls with the others. The blades are sharper. The price is great, even better with Prime. If you can't wait, WallyWorld sells them at a reasonable price. I'm here to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the Gillette Mach3 Turbo razors. He’s used them for many years. We had the previous razor handle for about 5+ years and decided to buy another one. Not only does this come with the handle but two refills as well!! They arrived very fast. The blades are sharp but do not leave behind razor burn or cuts on your skin. The price on Amazon is comparable to the store, but why go to the store when you can have it sent to your door!
customer_reviews.author: S T

customer_reviews.title: Not battery operated. Still a good Woman's razor handle.
customer_reviews.text: I will write off this purchase as my mistake in not reading closer. My original Mach 3 Turbo razor is battery operated. This is a static (the head does incline manually) non-battery model. It has a pink or teal handle (I am partially color blind). I would not buy it as a man's razor. I already cut the package open automatically assuming there was only 1 Turbo Battery operated unit. I will gift it to a female friend.
customer_reviews.author: ReconVet

customer_reviews.title: Best Razors!
customer_reviews.text: Their customer service is amazing! The razors work just as described and beyond. They are amazing for the price. These are high quality razors that last longer than the cheap plastic razors from other stores. I just started using Gillette brand razors after their commercial and they are AMAZING. From now and on I will only be using Gillette razors. They are great for the price and quality. The product includes one handle and one blade.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it at all
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try the Gillette Mach3 Turbo for a change. I did not like it at all. I'll be going back to the Schick Hydro 5..... It's a MUCH better shave....
customer_reviews.author: Barry Brawley

customer_reviews.title: I like my disposables more
customer_reviews.text: These work okay. I don't see why I need so many blades on my razor. My cheaper, two blade, disposable razors work better. Maybe I need to use these longer. With these razors, I miss more spots and don't gain any comfort.
customer_reviews.author: L Nist, MD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’d gotten sick of my regular women’s razors becoming dull after one or two uses, so I thought I’d give this a try. I love it, it feels nice to grip and I got a close shave without butchering my skin. The blades lasted way longer than any razors I’ve used before.
customer_reviews.author: Emelrich

customer_reviews.title: Shaves the face
customer_reviews.text: The neck on my Mach 3 broke after 18 years. I was devastated, but this thing saved me. I absolutely can’t stand more than 3 razor blades, so the M3 is perfect. Be aware that this item does not come with the razor holder - I trashed mine after I ordered this, and wish I hadn’t now.
customer_reviews.author: Jerstern

customer_reviews.title: The best blade out there
customer_reviews.text: Still the best. More blades simply get in the way of fine tuning your shave. Three is optimal. The sharpness on these is exceptional. As is the durability... buying a lifetime supply !
customer_reviews.author: Walid

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent razor but it is nowhere near one of the best. At the price & based on reviews that I’ve read (on and off Amazon) it is definitely not in the top few razors for a close shave. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: One of the best razors I have used, and hasnt cut my skin like some. I use this to shave my head
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Razor and blades are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy beard, and I was constantly using a toothbrush during my shave to clean hair out of the 4 & 5 blade razor blades. This is a well balanced razor, and I rarely have to clean out the blades during my shave. The blades are sharp and last a long time. I hope that Gillete keeps them on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Walden

customer_reviews.title: Too bad. Sounded like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Too bad. Sounded like a good idea. Found out too late to return it together with the refills I purchased at the same time. Swivel head makes it Impossible to get to difficult areas such as under nose. I'll donate it to the needy and stay with my Gillette SensorExcel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gillette Fusion ProGlide is better
customer_reviews.text: I've used the pro glide for years. It's the best razor I've found. I tried the Mach3 because of the advertising. I bought a set of the replacement blades. It doesn't give me the same shave as the Gillette Fusion ProGlide. I don't feel comfortable using this and would never buy again as long as the Gillette Fusion ProGlide is on the market. The Gillette Fusion ProGlide is a breakthrough in face shaving technology. When i run out of replacement blades for the Mach3, I'm going to switch back.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene H.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't buy this is a good value...The blade last about 1 month after i use electric shaver first...nice clean shave...
customer_reviews.author: A Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst razors. I would rather just buy cheap disposable ones. It’s a small/short feeling handle and so light weight it feels flimsy. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy glide. Last longer. I definitely recommend a buy. Good for new born head shaving also. However, the glide become greasy after several uses. Keep it in a dry place after every use.
customer_reviews.author: A K.

customer_reviews.title: Gillette Mach3 Turbo Men's Razor, Handle & 1 Blade Refill
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and included the razor, a blade on the razor and 1 blade refill.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha_B_Knights

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a spare. It’s not the best, but it was a good price. Good for a spare but not your everyday shave.
customer_reviews.author: Agteyiiccvjk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite razor blade. It works great, well balanced, and easy to clean. Also, the price was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Fit4life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best razor I’ve ever used, nice and smooth. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Murdock

customer_reviews.title: That you get a better shave and, that the razor cleans out better.
customer_reviews.text: To get a better shave and, to have a razor that the blades clean out good. Grate 3 blade razor!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Willame Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: First couple times shaving I barely felt it. Very good product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Impeccably good deal. Shipping was rather slow but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great razor, only 1 blade.
customer_reviews.text: This only comes with ONE blade! It’s a great razor But does Not come with 2 blades! Just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: JustJanet4US

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Mach 3 for years now. Every time I get a smooth shave with no cuts. Few times I ran out of blades and had to use the disposable ones and every time I get a cut and bleeding. Never with the Mach 3. Always reliable. Always smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I gave a gray razor and the blades work on this one too. I was very happy
customer_reviews.author: chris quintana

customer_reviews.title: For my son-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Needed badly as he was trying to grow a beard! Ugly!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph M. Amendola

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: WAY WAY WAY overpriced. there is only ONE razor. There is only one razor. I bought 3 for 7.99 locally. NO NO NO NO
customer_reviews.author: mick hanson

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I have ever used . Even gets those hard to reach hairs . I’ll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: karl walet

customer_reviews.title: We are going 3 blades
customer_reviews.text: All you really need. You don’t need 5 blades or even 4 blades. This triple blade bad boy leave my face silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Nordquist

customer_reviews.title: Advertised inaccurately: no refills
customer_reviews.text: Great razor, but be aware there are no refill blades included, even though the “size” is listed as the razor plus two refills. Apparently Amazon’s brilliant AI counts the triple-blade feature as three separate blades, when in fact they are a single razor head. Otherwise, no complaints, this is a solid razor.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Best razor blades I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best razor blades I've ever used. When they say it works better then a disposable after 10 shaves they mean it. I'm getting 15 shaves per blade (I clean and dry them after each use). Once in a while I try different products but always go back to these.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W.

customer_reviews.title: The picture shows a pack with two razors, one on the handle, and one in reserve.
customer_reviews.text: What I got was a razor with no extra cartridge. An Amazon bait and switch - the first one I've encountered that has been this blatant.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good cost/benefit ratio. Smoove shave.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth shave, no cuts. 4 or 5 blade razors won't give straight lines for beard trimming or get close up under my nose - this still does alright for that. Cost here was much better than pharmacy chains.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios Panagakos

customer_reviews.title: Misleading tagline to fool customer
customer_reviews.text: The tag line is mis leading. It says extra refill blade but it doesn't contain any refill. Only the handle and the razor itself.
customer_reviews.author: Sankarshan D.

customer_reviews.title: As good as the Mach5
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the price creep for razor blades, so I downgraded. Works as well as a Mach 4 or 5. Each blade lasts 1-2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent razor. Will not buy the more expensive razor any more
customer_reviews.author: Carol Alaimo

customer_reviews.title: #1 choice
customer_reviews.text: Only razor that I use.. this razor is the perfect whisker killer. Comfortable, simple, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Don’t grow a lot of facial hair so the razor have been holding up well and easily each those tight spot with their slim build. Handle weight feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Raul760

customer_reviews.title: Clean shave
customer_reviews.text: The razor provides a clean shave and is a well-made product. After all, it's a little Gille.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Getting what you order
customer_reviews.text: You only get one razor and zero refills when your supposed to get two extra razors
customer_reviews.author: Ron Trapp

customer_reviews.title: The information given says Handle & 2 Blade Refill  THERE IS NO REFILL
customer_reviews.text: The information given says Handle & 2 Blade Refill THERE IS NO REFILL
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper shave!
customer_reviews.text: These razors are as just as a comfortable shave as Gillette's expensive proglide razors for under half the price! However, they do not stay as consistently sharp as the 5 blade razors, but I think I save money overall in the long run by using these.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Fire the delivery gal.  Razor is great.
customer_reviews.text: Razor is great. Delivery gal was a bitch. Did not hand it to me but threw it in my rose bush. All the while rap music was blaring from her van.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shave
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and I love this. My legs have never been so smooth and it's cheaper than women razors.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best blades
customer_reviews.text: Shaves smoother, easier and closer than any other blade I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: BtcNorcal

customer_reviews.title: Great slim long lasting razor
customer_reviews.text: Great slim head, no tugging, lubrication strip lasts and you get many shaved per cartridge. Wish it had a edge trimmer blade on the back of the cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were easier to clean. They get clogged really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Van Rippoe

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best razor just store them in dry place after each use
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Good deal together with the blade refills
customer_reviews.text: I used to use, on a daily basis, only disposable razors. Recently I figured it out it would be cheaper to just use this product together with Gillette Mach3 Men's Razor Blade Refills, 10 Count. Basically you will get 11 razors for $25, which is way cheaper than the disposable razors selling at any supermarket. I did not use to buy this kind of product online but from now on I will pay more attention to prices and continue to buy from here rather than a supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: TPC

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth shaver but only received one refill instead of 2 refill blades
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is great, provides smooth close shave without irritation, but only received one blade refill when I had ordered the two refills.
customer_reviews.author: carlyle Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I can not comment about longevity yet as it has been used only for few days. So far, it meets the expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: ONLY HAS 1 REFILL
customer_reviews.text: Product shows that it comes with two refills, however upon receipt it only contains one cartridge and one razor stick.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny Patel

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor to get clean shave without any cut.
customer_reviews.text: As always, Gillette is the best. This razor is super comfortable. Amazon sent me a razor without a refill as shown in the picture but they sent a replacement for free when contacted. +1 for that.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Wrong quantity. Not as advertised. Only a handle and a razor!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as described. Says it come with refills but it doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it curved nicely to ensure no cuts. Sharp blades and nice grip.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Goulet

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: advertised as mach3 turbo but I received regular mach3 blades.very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great razor. I like the whiter handle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the new handle. Also, I like the Mach 3. 10/10 would recommend to a friend/brother.
customer_reviews.author: CrimeDog

customer_reviews.title: I have my safety razor for a good shave. I use this when I'm in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have my safety razor for a good shave. I use this when I'm in a hurry. It works fine and has a place in things.
customer_reviews.author: john leca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best razor I have ever used - and I am 65 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Cox

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Best shave Ever! Smooth and nice. Designed so you can rinse in between the blades which is key. You may get a few extra comfortable shaves keeping it clean. Good Purchase
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: bought for my husband to shave his head - and ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my husband to shave his head - and he has a full head of hair and he says very smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: Joy H

customer_reviews.title: gillete
customer_reviews.text: the handle is great, came without the two refills. use caution if buying!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this one out of the package and was disappointed with the feel of it
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a Mach 3 Handle that is around 6 years old. The old one was solid and lasted a long, long time. I got this one out of the package and was disappointed with the feel of it. It is MUCH lighter and feels more hollow than my old one. Im sure its just how they are making it these days and not an Indian knock-off (as I have bought before on Amazon if you see my other reviews), but it is sad to see the quality of the make these days. Fits all my razors fine and still cuts well, just wanted a more solid feel like it used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Dan+Em

customer_reviews.title: I've tried all kinds of other razors... ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all kinds of other razors... I keep coming back to the standard by which all others are judged. At this point, I'm not sure why I even try something else.
customer_reviews.author: PenguinPair

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best. Hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down just the best razor money can buy. I’m a lady and don’t like lady razors. I have course hair and this razor is the only one that leaves smooth skin. And I’ve tried them ALL! If you are fine with cheap razors this may be overkill for you but if your looking for results this is it. Seriously...no other brand can beat Gillette! I’m old so that brings wisdom meaning I’ve searched for many years so I’m bestowing my knowledge. 😂 but seriously...... it’s true.
customer_reviews.author: MeeMee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tried ALL the rest and keep coming home to these guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying the battery powered Mach 3 but it was not. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It felt very cheap so I ended up returning for a gillette fusion
customer_reviews.author: jd9085

customer_reviews.title: Still a good razor.
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to come with two blade refills but only came with one! Oh well. Still a good razor.
customer_reviews.author: joel dielman

customer_reviews.title: Wish it included blade shield....
customer_reviews.text: Would grade higher, as I love this product. The deductions is for a lack of providing protection for the single blade, which I am now travelling with.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Pope

customer_reviews.title: How many times can you re-invent the same thing?
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight and no back blade. There are disposable brands that are stronger and more useful.
customer_reviews.author: ANZicCO

customer_reviews.title: Don't look like Chewie
customer_reviews.text: Best razor in the world. This is why the refills are so expensive. You will just buy one pack and it will last you the rest of your life. Strong enough for a man but made for a woman. Use it daily if you want. Men should use it too. What is up with this beard thing going on? I can't tell any of you apart. Seriously, you all look like Chewbacca.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T

customer_reviews.title: No razor carrier. :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing at this price that it did not come with a razor cradle. Razor, however, shaves like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: I had the blades from some time ago and got this since I lose handle. Expected better shave. I.get better results from decent disposal types and Henrys blows this away at a.much.lower cost. I have light hair growth and was really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I like the razors, the shave is smooth and the price is right. I used these years ago before Venus and I remember them to be better. I have them a 4 because I will use them, but not sure I would reorder. The handle is heavy and I remember to be wiser
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. One i brought prior at a store and another off amazon. I purchased this to leave at my work desk. I am satisfied with the razor and it performs as expected. Its usually just one stroke, I rarely go 2.
customer_reviews.author: BigTangTheory

customer_reviews.title: Legs are nice & smooth
customer_reviews.text: Just used to shave my legs & works well. Legs are nice & smooth, clean shave, no cuts or issues. Much better price on Amazon rather than Walmart, Target etc.
customer_reviews.author: angela christine

customer_reviews.title: Gillette Mach3 Turbo Men's Razor with 1 MACH3... , excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Gillette Mach3 Turbo Men's Razor with 1 MACH3... , excellent product. Gillette products have never let me down. Use them for 60yrs, and before that my father used them, well, ever since I can remember
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Way better than any 2
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to razor. Only 3 blades? No problem. Way better than any 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 blade razor I've tried. I wish this particular one came with a handle holder like my other one has (hence, the 4 star rating).
customer_reviews.author: McFuch

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great about these
customer_reviews.text: Good shave for the first few times and then blades dull. Not much better than the disposable shavers.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They don't drag and cause a razor burn. He won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Stormchaser

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product but i do not think i got that close of a shave.
customer_reviews.author: Jack P/Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gillette makes grate razors. Schick is awful! Fast service. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: but I feel like i need more blades than 3
customer_reviews.text: Decent razor, but I feel like i need more blades than 3. Just feels a bit lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: BTheory

customer_reviews.title: Does not clog
customer_reviews.text: Much better than four or five razor blades. It does not get clogged and is very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome 3 blade shaver !
customer_reviews.text: Three blades work better the 4, 5 or 6 ! My God these blade manufacturers and marketing has gone overboard! This is best I've tried !
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Day

customer_reviews.title: This Is a Imatation Mach3 Turbo
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered April 16th It Arrived May 8th If You Expext This Made In China To Be a Turbo Forget It. It Is Not Made To Vibrate As My others Have Been That I Have bought At Walmart. Better To Buy American Made!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: I got razor burn on my sack (sorry no photo)
customer_reviews.text: My skin does not like this razor, I dislike the gooey moisture strip that rubs off after a few uses. I'll stick with the fusion (I am taking about shaving my groin region, not my face)
customer_reviews.author: Fer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A review I read before puchase mentioned battery. This ...
customer_reviews.text: A review I read before puchase mentioned battery. This product has no battery. Looking to replace my Gillette Mach 3 w battery, this was a step backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lowcountry

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: These handles are not what they used to be. My old handle finally wore out, the rubber pieces were coming off. I ordered a replacement and the new one feels light and crappy. Very disappointing. .
customer_reviews.author: AndyB

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use a disposable razor again, or a 5-blade razor
customer_reviews.text: If you've used the dual-blade disposable razors, you know a big problem is that the blades get clogged as you shave and are very difficult to clean out. This 3-blade razor rinses clean so easily it's fantastic. For this reason, I'd recommend against the 5-blade razors as I've read they are as difficult to clean as the disposable ones. They also provide a great shave, and the blades last much longer than disposable razors. Great product all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: Long Beach Native

product_meta.title: Gillette Mach3 Turbo Men's Razor Handle + 2 Blade Refills
product_meta.description: Style:Razor + 2 RefillsGillette Mach3 Turbo razors for men feature stonger-than-steel blades that stay sharper longer (vs. Sensor3). With sharper, Turbo cutting blades (first 2 blades vs. Sensor3), the Mach3 razor is engineered to last for 15 comfortable shaves. These Gillette razors feature a long-lasting lubrication strip to provide an incredible glide. Mach3 Turbo has a microfin skin guard that stretches the skin, and prepares hair to be cut. The kit features a premium Mach3 razor handle, expertly balanced and weighted for a great shaving experience. Mach3 Turbo men's razor fits all Mach3 blade refills.
feature_bullets: Gillette razors for men with stronger-than-steel blades stay sharper longer (vs. Sensor3)
Engineered to last for 15 comfortable shaves
Gillette Mach3 Turbo men's razor features sharper, Turbo cutting blades (first 2 blades vs. Sensor3)
Long-lasting lubrication strip provides an incredible glide
Microfin skin guard stretches the skin, and prepares hair to be cut
